reporter_caption.center: STATE IN THE INTEREST OF FORET, 401 So.2d 1195 (La. 1981)

caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA IN THE INTEREST OF KEITH G. FORET AND KEVIN LAVERGNE.

opinion.posture: In re Keith G. Foret and Kevin Lavergne, applying for reconsideration of denied writ of June 22, 1981, and stay order. Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit. Nos. 11742, 11743 and 11744. Parish of Jefferson.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] DIXON, C. J., concurs in the denial. Applicant may apply again in the event of an adverse ruling.West Page 1196
